item.title: Metalcore playlist for 12/2012
item.description: Including: A Day To Remember, All That Remains, Beartooth, Caleb Shomo Speech, Lamb Of God, Memphis May Fire, Motionless In White, Of Mice & Men, Suicide Silence, Veil Of Maya.

item.description: Including: Alesana, August Burns Red, Avenged Sevenfold, Between The Buried And Me, Born Of Osiris, Like Moths To Flames, Norma Jean, Parkway Drive, The Devil Wears Prada, The Ghost Inside.
